hero.title: Transform Your Startup Through Strategic Partnerships
hero.description: Connect with complementary startups, share resources, and accelerate growth through our intelligent ecosystem marketplace. From skill exchanges to strategic collaborations.

categories.name: Technology Exchange
categories.description: Share technical expertise and development resources

categories.name: Marketing Collaboration
categories.description: Joint marketing campaigns and brand partnerships

categories.name: Co-Investment
categories.description: Shared funding opportunities and investor introductions

categories.name: Distribution Network
categories.description: Access new markets through partner channels

activeOpportunities.title: Sustainable Supply Chain Network
activeOpportunities.description: Building a network of eco-friendly logistics partners to create the most sustainable supply chain in e-commerce. Seeking partnerships with green technology startups focused on carbon reduction and renewable energy solutions.

resources.title: Partnership Agreement Templates
resources.description: Comprehensive collection of legally-vetted partnership agreement templates covering various collaboration scenarios, equity splits, and IP protection.

resources.title: Partnership ROI Calculator
resources.description: Advanced calculator to measure and predict partnership return on investment with customizable metrics, scenario planning, and comprehensive reporting features.

resources.title: Collaboration Workspace Suite
resources.description: Integrated workspace platform designed specifically for startup partnerships with project management, file sharing, and communication tools all in one place.

metrics.title: Partnership Success Metrics
metrics.subtitle: Real-time insights into our ecosystem's collaborative impact

tools.name: Partnership Proposal Generator
tools.description: AI-powered tool that creates customized partnership proposals based on your startup profile and target partner requirements.
features: AI-generated content tailored to your industry

tools.name: Collaboration Agreement Builder
tools.description: Step-by-step wizard to create legally sound collaboration agreements with built-in compliance checks and expert review options.

tools.name: Partnership Performance Dashboard
tools.description: Comprehensive analytics platform to track, measure, and optimize your partnership performance with real-time insights and reporting.

tools.name: Resource Exchange Platform
tools.description: Secure platform for sharing resources, expertise, and assets between partner organizations with built-in access controls.
